dt: {bc}supplied with less than the minimum amount of the nutrients or foods essential for sound health and growth {bc}marked by {d_link|undernutrition|undernutrition}

dt.t: Since these drugs suppress appetite, stimulant users are often {wi}undernourished{/wi} and experience all the ill effects of that condition.

dt: {bc}poorly supplied with vital elements or qualities

shortdef: supplied with less than the minimum amount of the nutrients or foods essential for sound health and growth : marked by undernutrition
poorly supplied with vital elements or qualities
